content: the 40 instep sts round 3 work pattern row 11 across the round round 5 k1 work pattern row 1 to the last of the foot sts k1 continue in pattern across the 40 instep sts round 7 work pattern row 3 across the round round 9 k1 work pattern row 5 to the last of the foot sts k1 continue in pattern across the 40 instep sts after round 10 you should be back to 80 sts the foot continue working in pattern beginning with pattern row 7 until you have worked 40 more rounds or the foot measures23 cm / 9 from the back of the heel the toes change back to 4mm needles and using green yarn knit one round and then work the toes as for the basic stocking the hanging tab work 40 row in single moss stitch on 4 sts using red yarn and 4mm needles as for the basic stocking © frankie brown 2010 my patterns are for personal use only and should not be used to knit items for sale abbreviations st /sts stitch / stitches k knit p purl sl 1 slip one stitch purlwise k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl two stitches together ssk slip slip knit see below kwise knitwise as if to knit pwise purlwise as if to purl wyib with yarn held at the back of the work as if to knit wyif with yarn held at the front of the work as if to purl slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise or knitwise followed by purlwise one at a time insert tip of left needle into stitches from above put yarn round right needle and knit both stitches together © frankie brown 2010 my patterns are for personal use only and should not be used to knit items for sale
